Row.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Patronage[ENDCOLOR] enhances the benefits of City-State friendship.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting Patronage will cause [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with City-States to degrade 25% slower than normal.[NEWLINE]Unlocks building the [COLOR_RED]Forbidden Palace[ENDCOLOR].[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting all policies in the Patronage tree will cause all [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Allied[ENDCOLOR] City-States to occasionally gift you [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great People.
